roleset_name: preventing or delaying the development of cancer

roles.descr: theme, specific cancer whose development is being prevented
roles.descr_trans: 主题，正在预防其发展的特定癌症

roles.descr: secondary predication; thing prevented (e.g. from metastasizing)
roles.descr_trans: 二次预测；被阻止的事物（例如转移）

roleset_name_trans: 预防或延缓癌症的发展
